Shockwave:




Wasting time, Shockwave replied to the fuzor.  "This is Emperor Shockwave of 
the Neo Decepticon Empire.  Track my position and aid me and my comrade in 
battle and you shall be given places in the Empire's hierarchy.  To not agree 
would be illogical."
